content: **forest trail crochet headband** this cosy crochet headband pattern is just perfect for those in-between days when you re not sure if you ll need a hat or not you ll be able to keep your ears warm out on the trail but won t have to risk getting hat-hair to achieve it i love the texture in this headband that comes from the front post double_crochet stitches the pattern includes a short photo tutorial on where to position the fpdcs **construction** this crochet headband is worked from side to side i love this method for making headbands because you can just keep adding row until you have reached the circumference that you want so you pretty much eliminate any risk of the headband not fitting - ---- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more 1 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe ---- © ned & mimi 2019 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted *
